meanings.definition: To move quickly and erratically over or around obstacles.
meanings.sent1: The rabbit will hedgehop over the fallen log.
meanings.sent2: The squirrel likes to hedgehop from tree to tree.
meanings.sent3: The hedgehog decided to hedgehop through the maze for fun.
meanings.sent4: She had to hedgehop through her busy schedule to make time for a break.
meanings.sent5: The children watched in amazement as the agile cat began to hedgehop along the fence.

meanings.definition: A quick, erratic movement over or around obstacles.
meanings.sent1: The hedgehop of the squirrel caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The hedgehop of the rabbit was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: The hedgehop of the puppy as it chased its tail was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The hedgehop of the ball down the stairs startled the cat.
meanings.sent5: The hedgehop of the butterfly from flower to flower was a beautiful dance in the garden.
